pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: High-level introduction to the Rouge Cardinal Company web application, its purpose, tech stack, and key architectural decisions

pages.purpose: Guide developers through initial setup and common development tasks

pages.purpose: List dependencies, tech stack versions, and installation steps

pages.purpose: Document pnpm scripts for development, testing, building, and database operations

pages.title: Environment Configuration
pages.purpose: Explain T3 Env setup, required environment variables, and configuration validation

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: Comprehensive overview of the application's architectural patterns and design principles

pages.title: System Overview
pages.purpose: High-level system architecture diagram and component relationships

pages.title: Clean Architecture and DAL Pattern
pages.purpose: Explain the four-layer Clean Architecture (Presentation, Application, DAL, Database) and 92% SOLID compliance in DAL modules

pages.title: Frontend Architecture
pages.purpose: Document Next.js App Router, route groups, Server Components vs Client Components, and rendering strategies

pages.title: Backend Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain Supabase integration, Server Actions pattern, and backend service architecture

pages.title: Security Architecture
pages.purpose: Document defense-in-depth security model with seven layers from network to audit

pages.title: Database
pages.purpose: Complete guide to PostgreSQL schema, RLS policies, and database patterns

pages.title: Schema Management
pages.purpose: Explain declarative schema approach in supabase/schemas/ and migration workflow

pages.title: Core System Tables
pages.purpose: Document system tables: abonnes_newsletter, messages_contact, configurations_site, analytics_events, logs_audit

pages.title: Content Tables
pages.purpose: Document content tables: spectacles, articles_presse, communiques_presse, membres_equipe, partners, home_hero_slides, home_about_content

pages.title: Media and Classification System
pages.purpose: Explain media, media_tags, media_folders, categories, tags tables and many-to-many relationships

pages.title: Row Level Security (RLS)
pages.purpose: Document RLS policies on all 36 tables, policy patterns (public/admin/restrictive), and admin_views_owner role

pages.title: Content Versioning System
pages.purpose: Explain content_versions table, automatic versioning triggers on 9 tables, and restore workflow

pages.title: Views and Database Functions
pages.purpose: Document views (SECURITY INVOKER vs admin_views_owner), RPC functions (reorder, cleanup), and aggregation patterns

pages.title: Data Access Layer (DAL)
pages.purpose: Comprehensive guide to the DAL layer, SOLID principles, and data access patterns

pages.title: DAL Architecture and Principles
pages.purpose: Explain DAL SOLID pattern, 92% compliance, server-only modules, and architectural rules (no revalidatePath, no email imports)

pages.title: DAL Modules Overview
pages.purpose: List and describe all DAL modules in lib/dal/, their responsibilities, and key functions

pages.title: DALResult Pattern and Error Handling
pages.purpose: Explain DALResult<T> discriminated union, toDALResult helper, and error handling conventions

pages.title: Type Mapping and DTOs
pages.purpose: Document dual Zod schema pattern (client: number, server: bigint), DTO conversion, and type safety strategies

pages.title: Frontend Development
pages.purpose: Guide to building UI components, handling forms, and implementing frontend features

pages.title: Page Structure and Routing
pages.purpose: Explain App Router structure, (admin) and (marketing) route groups, and file organization

pages.title: Server Components and Server Actions
pages.purpose: Document Server Components (default), Server Actions pattern, and cache revalidation strategies

pages.title: Client Components and Interactivity
pages.purpose: Explain 'use client' directive, when to use Client Components, and hydration patterns

pages.title: Form Handling and Validation
pages.purpose: Document react-hook-form integration, Zod schema validation, dual schema pattern, and form submission flow

pages.title: Styling and Theming
pages.purpose: Explain Tailwind CSS configuration, CSS variables for theming, dark mode, and glass-morphism effects
